text: (daoy amnuot ning thounhotrean pi sa ndi pheap) puokke kaban niyeay tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda thveu aoy chhngay choh rveang kar thveudamnaer robsa puok yeung( pi tambn muoy tow tambn muoy) . haey puokke kaban bampean leu khluoneng . banteabmk yeung ban thveu aoy rueng puokke klaycha ruengnitean( samreab niyeay t knea) haey yeung ban kamchat puokke aoy khchatkhchay . pitabrakd nasa nowknong rueng noh kuchea phosdo tang samreab real anak del atthmot ning doengkoun
